arts.ttl: Struggling Brentford deepen Amorim's Man United malaise
arts.sum: Manchester United were made to pay for a disastrous first 20 minutes against Brentford, suffering another Premier League defeat.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim responds to Man Utd sack pressure after miserable Brentford defeat
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim's side were beaten 3-1 at Brentford on Saturday, piling more pressure onto the Manchester United manager who can't find any consistency from his players

arts.ttl: Bruno misses penalty as Man Utd lose at Brentford
arts.sum: Highlights from Brentford's match against Manchester United in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Opinion: Man United already have two big problems with summer signing after 0% Brentford nightmare
arts.sum: Manchester United’s season went from bad to worse after their 3-1 defeat at Brentford. The Red Devils were woeful again and ended up well beaten...

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim makes alarming admission after 'shambolic' Man Utd outplayed by Brentford
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim said his team had worked on dealing with long balls all week, only to be undone by two of them inside 20 minutes at Brentford

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim admits Man Utd ‘really confused’ in Brentford defeat
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim admitted that Man Utd’s play was “really confused” as they failed to control proceedings in defeat to Brentford on Saturday afternoon. Igor Thiago put the Bees ahead after just seven minutes before doubling the hosts lead in the 20th minute. The Red Devils pulled one back shortly after when Benjamin Sesko scored from […] The post Ruben Amorim admits Man Utd ‘really confused’ in Brentford defeat first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Brentford 3-1 Man United: Post-match Man United player ratings
arts.sum: A poor start from Manchester United saw hosts Brentford 2-0 up in 20 minutes, with Benjamin Sesko's first United goal not enough to salvage a point as a last-minute Mathias Jensen dagger killed the game. United reacted well following their goal, mounting pressure constantly throughout the second half, which led to a penalty, as Bryan Mbeumo was pulled down by Nathan Collins.

arts.ttl: Brentford 3-1 Man United PLAYER RATINGS: Which United defender was 'run ragged' by the Bees? Who was 'at sixes and sevens'? And which four players could only be given 5/10?
arts.sum: CHRIS WHEELER: Ruben Amorim 's men fell behind in the eighth minute to a fantastic strike from Igor Thiago, and their afternoon went from bad to worse from there.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim's record with Man Utd is lamentable as clueless players undone again at Brentford
arts.sum: BRENTFORD 3-1 MANCHESTER UNITED: Ruben Amorim has won just nine of his 33 Premier League games in charge as away record stretches to no wins in eight after another slip-up

arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes blows penalty as Manchester United lose at Brentford
arts.athr: David Hytner at the Gtech Community Stadium
arts.sum: The holy grail continues to elude Ruben Amorim. Call it progress, consistency, momentum. Or just back-to-back Premier League victories for the first time. The manager had taken encouragement from last Saturday’s 2-1 home win over Chelsea, even if United had almost located their own feet with heavy gunfire in the closing stages. It needed to be a platform. And yet, as so often under their beleaguered leader, United followed one step forward with two in the opposite direction. The question beforehand had concerned which United would turn up because nobody can ever be sure, least of all Amorim. Continue reading...
